title: Spellcasting Ability
content:

Strike with your weapon, afflicting your foe with a resonance that hurts them for 1d8 Thunder damage when they move.

Ring the bell of impending doom. If the target is at full health, you deal 1d8 Necrotic damage instead.

Explode a corpse, causing it to impale those around it.
